query.sql: SELECT to_char(phyrds,'999G999G999G999') reads, to_char(phyblkrd,'999G999G999G999') block_reads, to_char(singleblkrds,'999G999G999G999') single_block_reads, to_char(phywrts,'999G999G999G999') writes, to_char(phyblkwrt,'999G999G999G999') block_writes, to_char(ROUND(readtim /100,2),'999G999D999') read_time, to_char(ROUND(singleblkrdtim/100,2),'999G999D999') single_block_time, to_char(ROUND(writetim /100,2),'999G999D999') write_time, round(lstiotim/100,2) last_io_time, round(avgiotim/100,2) avg_io_time, round(maxiortm/100,2) max_read_time, round(maxiowtm/100,2) max_write_time FROM v$filestat WHERE file#=:FILE_ID

select b.name tablespace_name, a.name file_name, a.file#, to_char ( round ( (nvl (c.hwm, 1) * a.block_size)/1024/1024), '999G999G999G999') "SMALL_MB", to_char ( round ( (a.blocks * a.block_size)/1024/1024), '999G999G999G999') "CURRENT_MB", to_char ( round ( (a.blocks * a.block_size - nvl (c.hwm, 1) * a.block_size)/1024/1024) , '999G999G999G999') "SAVE_MB", to_char ( round ( d.bytes /1024/1024), '999G999G999G999') "FREE_MB", 'alter database datafile '||a.file#||' resize '|| to_char ( greatest (8,round ( (nvl (c.hwm, 1) * a.block_size + a.block_size) / 1024 / 1024) + 8))||'M;' "SQL" from v$datafile a left join v$tablespace b on (a.ts# = b.ts#) left join (select file_id, max(block_id + blocks - 1) hwm from dba_extents where file_id=:FILE_ID group by file_id) c on (c.file_id = a.file#) left join ( select file_id, sum (bytes) bytes from dba_free_space where file_id=:FILE_ID group by file_id ) d on (d.file_id = a.file#) where file#=:FILE_ID order by 7 desc;

with a as ( select owner||'.'||segment_name||decode(partition_name,null,'','.'||partition_name) sgmnt,segment_type type,block_id,blocks blks, block_id-lag(block_id+blocks,1,0) over (order by block_id asc) diff--, --lag(owner||'.'||segment_name,1,NULL) over (order by block_id asc) sgmntlag, --lead(owner||'.'||segment_name,1,NULL) over (order by block_id asc) sgmntlead, --DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY owner||'.'||segment_name asc) "RANK" from dba_extents where file_id=:FILE_ID order by block_id asc ) select sgmnt, type, block_id,blks from( select sgmnt,type,block_id,blks/*,case when sgmntlag=sgmnt or sgmntlead=sgmnt then 1 else 0 end ll,"RANK"*/ from a union all select 'FREE','FREE',block_id-diff,diff/*,0,(-1)*block_id*/ from a where diff<>0 order by 3 asc )

with a as ( select ROW_NUMBER () over (order by block_id asc) rn,owner||'.'||segment_name||decode(partition_name,null,'','.'||partition_name) sgmnt,segment_type type,block_id,blocks blks, block_id-lag(block_id+blocks,1,0) over (order by block_id asc) diff from dba_extents where file_id=:FILE_ID order by block_id asc ) select sgmnt, type, blk_id,blks from( select sgmnt,type,blk_id,sum(blks) blks from ( select sgmnt,type,blks, (select nvl(block_id,(select block_id from a d where d.rn=b.rn)) block_id from a c where rn=(select nvl(max(rn),b.rn-1) from a c where c.block_id<b.block_id and c.sgmnt<>b.sgmnt)+1) blk_id from a b) group by sgmnt,type,blk_id union all select 'FREE','FREE',block_id-diff,diff-1 from a where diff<>0 order by 3 asc )
